name: Collusion
description: A combination of Tuneyâ€™s Cherry base and Alfred Pudding cheesecake base. Added shisha vanilla as an emulsifier to pull the 2 together. Steep 5 days for the cheesecake to settle in.
author: Daytimefrank1

reviews.text: This was a great mix after the shake.  A couple of days later, I started getting a stem-like off note.  Guess I have a problem with INW cherries, because I got the same off note from another recipe that contains it.

This is absolutely delicious.  I mixed this on 2/25/2019 after you had posted on ELR.  I love the combination of Forest Fruits, Boysenberry, and Inw Cherries.  Combining this with the Cheesecake base is excellent.  Brilliant idea!  Love this mix.
